parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Map </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>


____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Draws a single line arrow on the map. To draw a color filled arrow of custom shape see [[BIS_fnc_drawArrow]] </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> map '''drawArrow''' [from, to, color] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> map: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [from, to, color]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> from: [[Array]] or [[Object]] - arrow start position in format: [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]] or [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> to: [[Array]] or [[Object]] - arrow end position in format: [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]] or [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - arrow color in format [r,g,b,a]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value><code>[[findDisplay]] 12 [[displayCtrl]] 51 [[ctrlAddEventHandler]] ["Draw", 
{
	_this [[select]] 0 [[drawArrow]] [
		[[player]], [[player]] [[getRelPos]] [100, 0], [1,0,0,1]
	];
}];</code></value></part><part><name/>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[drawEllipse]], [[drawIcon]], [[drawLine]], [[drawRectangle]], [[drawPolygon]], [[drawTriangle]], [[BIS_fnc_drawArrow]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
